name: Sophia Patel
description: Sophia is a corporate law specialist with over a decade of experience helping startups and enterprises navigate complex business regulations and mergers.

name: James Donovan
description: James is a fearless criminal defense attorney known for high-stakes courtroom wins and tireless advocacy for justice.

name: Aisha Rahman
description: Aisha is a compassionate family lawyer guiding clients through divorce, custody, and marriage issues with care and professionalism.

name: Liam Chen
description: Liam focuses on immigration law, helping clients secure visas, citizenship, and asylum with a high success rate.

name: Olivia Jones
description: Olivia is an expert in intellectual property law, securing patents and copyrights for inventors and creatives globally.

name: Ethan Morales
description: Ethan handles real estate transactions and disputes, protecting clients in residential and commercial property deals.

name: Grace Kim
description: Grace supports both employers and workers in employment law cases, including wrongful termination and discrimination.

name: Daniel Becker
description: Daniel is a strategic tax consultant, defending clients during audits and helping reduce tax liabilities legally.

name: Isabella Rossi
description: Isabella is passionate about environmental law, representing communities and NGOs in sustainability-related cases.

name: Noah Ahmed
description: Noah is a bankruptcy expert who helps individuals and businesses recover financially through legal restructuring.

name: Maya Fernandez
description: Maya is dedicated to victims of medical negligence, achieving justice in complex malpractice lawsuits.

name: Benjamin Lee
description: Benjamin is a civil rights advocate who defends individuals in discrimination and constitutional violation cases.
